news.summary: Listen to his cover of the track below.

news.title: My Bloody Valentine join No Music For Genocide streaming boycott
news.summary: No Music For Genocide reported Paul Weller's and Massive Attack's earlier requests to geo-block their music from Israel have recently been approved by their respective labels.

news.title: Youngiz: "When it’s time to step up, I want to step correctly – and do everything in my power to make a name for myself"
news.summary: Irish rap sensation Youngiz reflects on a landmark year, tells us what makes the Dublin scene so special, and discusses his pride in representing his country – even in the face of far-right backlash.

news.title: Imelda May announced for Jools Holland's Annual Hootenanny
news.summary: Jools Holland’s Hootenanny will air on BBC Two and BBC iPlayer on December 31.

news.title: 10 Things To Do In South Dublin: Museums, Markets, Festivals & More
news.summary: Boasting everything from brilliant recreation activities to gorgeous scenery and cultural landmarks, South Dublin is an essential destination. We look at 10 of its best experiences.

news.title: Lily Allen announces additional Dublin date
news.summary: Tickets go on sale tomorrow (Thursday, November 27) at 10 a.m.

news.title: Zach Bryan announces Cork and Belfast dates
news.summary: Tickets will go on sale Friday, December 5 at 10am.
